tweet:
big model updates today.

• GLM upgraded to v5 (744B MoE)
• Wan Video migrated to Airforce + unified res
• ElevenLabs Scribe v2 added
• Node 23 support fixed

open source, open models. try it out.
alt_tweet:
just shipped a full stack refresh.

GLM is now v5 (744B MoE).
Wan Video migrated to Airforce.
Scribe v2 added for STT.

plus we fixed Node 23 compat for the builders.

ship fast.
full_tweet:
big model updates today.

• GLM upgraded to v5 (744B MoE)
• Wan Video migrated to Airforce + unified res
• ElevenLabs Scribe v2 added
• Node 23 support fixed

open source, open models. try it out. #OpenSource #AI

image.prompt: Dynamic pixel art. The Pollinations bee mascot floating in front of three glowing holographic panels: one showing code, one showing video frames, one showing sound waves. Lime green (#ecf874) data streams connecting them. High contrast, warm lighting, cozy retro UI elements. 8-bit aesthetic.

reasoning: Focuses on the significant model upgrades (GLM 5 is a big deal) and infrastructure improvements. List format is easy to scan. Technical specifics (744B MoE, Node 23) build credibility with the dev audience.
